Ok I'ma be honest and say I'm a killer main... well this is a miserable time to play killer. Boons counter hexes too much, hold W meta, flashlight clickers, t-baggers, shit-talkers. Entitled survivor mains that unhook in your face but whine when you "tunnel" or facecamp... SBMM (skill based match making) is a complete joke. grades don't serve any purpose anymore. 

I love this game but since the boons and dead hard meta, it's too rage inducing to play consistently.

It's an excellent game, I love the whole "survivors vs hunter" concept, with the horror twist. But there are a few things that bug me... first is if you don't find a match u are stuck on a loading/searching screen and have to restart the game. Then once you finally find a game, it could take 5 min to load in. It does get annoying, but if you are true to gaming it really doesn't affect the game itself and the genius behind it. I strongly suggest getting this game if you want to send heebie jeebies down your spine, and maybe have friends get it to play with too!

这是一款典型的竞技游戏，对新手来说不太友好，但是个人觉得玩的时间长了会更有意思，会有一段时间越玩越想玩，特别是特别是在扮演人类的时候。个人还是比较推荐这款游戏的。这个游戏在优化上还没有成熟，还是会有一些大的改动，从游戏出来就开始玩伴随着改动也能体验到游戏制作者的改动倾向和游戏整体的发展方向的，挺开心！

Franchement je n'accroche pas. Des bugs à répétion (genre on reste coincé 'dans' le tueur...) ; des temps d'attente relativement longs ; les ambiances visuelle et sonore pas trop mal réussies mais dans l'ensemble pas très beau; matchmaking foireux... Et puis finalement pas très fun même à plusieurs ; sensation également d'un déséquilibre total entre le tueur et les survivants... Enfin voilà, c'est mon ressenti. Très déçu.
游戏不错，挺好玩的。可自从上次更新之后，一玩鬼点击创建一个大厅就闪退，重下一遍后还变本加厉。只要一进开头动画鼠标左键一点跳过就闪退，有点绝望···

After first 2 weeks, i gradually disappoined at this rank system. The idea of the game is fancy and the style is well designed. The match is exciting and fun. Great work.
But, like most of competitive games, the ranking system is a nightmare. Perks are so strong for new beginners to against. If you don't reach top level and have all 4 perks unlocked with 3 grade, you can hardly win above 16 rank. I struggled a lot in this lavel because I only have 2 perks. I usually find all my competitors have 4 super rare perks and 4 equipments, which makes the match so imbalance. I should say it is so frustrating  when you cannot catch anyone not because of your skill. I may not be the best but I think that's not always my problem.
I think the ranking system should also consider the equipment and perks between players. Basically there are 2 ways to do that. The first way is always match players with same number of perks. Say, if I have only 1 perk, each survivor in my match should also have 1 or 2 perks at most. The second way is set a limit of total perks for both survivors and killer. Survivors and killers should pick up the perks and equipment before game. There should be a discussion between survivors during that time. In addition, the equipment total should also have a limit. 4 dehook make the killer impossible to hang anyone after 1 minute because there is no hook left except the center base. Then survivors can do anything close to border area without fare because they know they will never be hooked. There are many such "strategies" in current game. I should say I will quit everytime I matched them because I know I cannot win. Does that a good game should be?
Did dev-team think about that when they release new features? Until the game changes I cannot recommend this one really but I wish this game will become better after fix.

i like it bechause it's based on teamwork

Good game, bad networking. Love playing the game but very hard to actually play. Constantly crashes when trying to find games, and get lagged out of games during loading screens. For the past week it has taken probably an average of half an hour of task manager quitting the game and restarting, and retrying to find a match to play 1 game. The game itself is great but that it is just unacceptablely bad. If this gets fixed then by all means I recommend but as of right now. Dont buy unless you like restarting more than you like playing.

Городские. Ненавижу, бл*ть, городских.
С тех пор как открыл эту турбазу совсем спокойной жизни нет!
Давеча, вот, четверо таких вломились ко мне во двор, пьяные, бегают, шумят, в капканы мои лезут! Для них это как игра, чёрт возьми! А я тут охочусь! Живу я тут! Мне некогда бегать за ними и просить вежливо уйти, я хочу посмотреть фильм и попить чайку. Нет же, приходится ловить бухих туристов, и вешать на крючки, чтоб протрезвели и в капканы не угодили. Так еще что удумали , генераторы мои старые на цвет мет, видимо, разбирать. Да им же 30 с лишним лет! Как дед помер, так к ним никто не подходил, это же опасно! Я как-то залез в один такой, теперь не рожа, а месиво. Проще новый купить. Так это, черт их побрал, лезут, их прогонишь-опять бегут. Даже не слушают, носятся, орут, в туалете прячутся, прямо перед носом деревянные щиты кидают, все ноги отдавили. Приходится рукоприкладствовать.. Ну а что сделаешь? По-другому же не понимают.Нда.. Опять, кажется, вандалы, залезли. Слышу кто-то в сундуке роется, пойду посмотрю..

Typically it takes about 20 min to find a game with 3 people.

And personally corrected the lag issues many were having in the new pach not to mention the game still is good as it was. The game is buggy. I can only join a game about 50% of the time. The other half of the time it just goes into an endless loading screen where the only way out is to force close from task manager. When the game does join, it usually runs error free.

The game has a lot of promise but other serious issues still persist.

[updated 2/3/2017]

I can join games more regularly by spamming quick join if I want to be a survivor.

The game needs major tweaking on perks, etc. to create better balance and more viable strategies.  The game simply needs more depth.

C'est sympa le temps de la découverte. Après un certain temps (20/25h) le plaisir diminue du fait de la répétitivité. Les mécaniques de jeu sont trop simples et les parties manquent d'objectifs (Chacune se ressemblent).

- En ce qui concerne les points négatifs : exploitation abusive des mécaniques de jeu de la part de la communauté : camping pour les tueurs et autres subterfuges côté survivants comme : bloquer le tueur, tourner sans fin autour de l'environnement etc ... qui tue l'envie de relancer une partie. C'est pas très bien optimisé : souvent ça ram même sur une bonne configuration, ça lag (Le tueur est l'host, P2P donc bon ...).
- En ce qui concerne les points positifs : C'est plutôt jolie, bonne ambiance, comme dans un bon film d'horreur. J'adore le tueur Piégeur, c'est le plus vicieux et bourrin à jouer. J'aime le côté asymétrique du 4v1. On a une bonne sensation de puissance, on peut libérer son côté psychopathe sans risquer la prison.

PS : Les parties en survivants deviennent intéressantes avec une bonne team équipée de micro casque, mais cela désavantage grandement le tueur (D’ailleurs raison pour laquelle il n'y pas de voice chat ni de chat dans le jeu).

Je donne un 12/20 au titre, correct, à acheter à 5/10€ en solde (pas plus).

Juego 100% Recomendado si quieres pasar un rato de tension con tus amigos.
[h1]Aspectos Positivos[/h1]
[*]Si no te gustan los juegos de terror por que te asustas facilmente no te preocupes,este juego es mas tension que de horror.
[*]Divertido Y mejor aun con amigos.
[*]Gran Cantidad de habilidades para cada personaje.
[*]Personalización de personajes e incluso packs de pago para mas aspectos.
[*] Sistema de rangos.
[*]Misiones Diarias y eventos casuales que multiplican los puntos obtenidos en cada partida

[h1] Aspectos Negativos [/h1]
[*] Mala Optimiazion del juego (tengo una 1050 y no puedo jugarlo en ultra debido a que baja repentinamente de 60 a 40 fps)
[*] Problemas de conexion debido a que el host de la partida es el que va de rol de asesino por lo cual de la conexion de ese jugador depende la jugabilidad de los supervivientes
[*] Algunos bugs que dificultan la jugabilidad.
[*] Bug exploit
